objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Historical lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to education and learning in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about education and learning using neutral register
Students create original historical themed content about education and learning in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Historical story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in historical context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within historical theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
